text: My Fellow Americans is a 1996 American comedy movie directed by Peter Segal and starring Jack Lemmon, James Garner, Dan Aykroyd, John Heard, Bradley Whitford, Lauren Bacall, Jeff Yagher, Sela Ward, Conchata Ferrell, Esther Rolle. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1996 comedy movies Category:1990s buddy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Peter Segal Category:Movies set in Washington, D.C.
title: My Fellow Americans
